body:
ayup,

sadly lifes come around ive got to quit now due to college/army. Ill still come on every now and then (every 5ish weeks depending on leave) and ill play then. Shoutout to all the people on the server i talk to, and sorry to all those ive caused beef with, also a big thanks to those close friends, you know who you are.

anyway atlas looks decent and i dont see avicus it closing anytime soon so enjoy it guys. i wish i could.
